Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: While this will end up being an SDK requirement, membership services does not actually expose an API to add attributes dynamically in the first place. ~smithbk please correct me in I am wrong

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 thanks for the clarification, ~smithbk has confirmed that. I'll open a feature request on member services and make it a pre-req for this one.

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: thanks very much for implementing this feature ~smithbk !
